# LogicFlow ÂÆû‰æã

## ‰∏Ä„ÄÅÊ¶ÇÂøµ

`LogicFlow` ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæÁºñËæëÊ°ÜÊû∂ÔºåÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæ‰∫§‰∫í„ÄÅÁºñËæëÊâÄÂøÖÈúÄÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÂíåÁÅµÊ¥ªÁöÑËäÇÁÇπËá™ÂÆö‰πâ„ÄÅÊèí‰ª∂Á≠âÊãìÂ±ïÊú∫Âà∂„ÄÇLogicFlow ÊîØÊåÅÂâçÁ´ØÁ†îÂèëËá™ÂÆö‰πâÂºÄÂèëÂêÑÁßçÈÄªËæëÁºñÊéíÂú∫ÊôØÔºåÂ¶ÇÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæ„ÄÅER Âõæ„ÄÅBPMN ÊµÅÁ®ãÁ≠â„ÄÇÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÂÆ°ÊâπÈÖçÁΩÆ„ÄÅÊú∫Âô®‰∫∫ÈÄªËæëÁºñÊéí„ÄÅÊó†‰ª£Á†ÅÂπ≥Âè∞ÊµÅÁ®ãÈÖçÁΩÆÈÉΩÊúâËæÉÂ•ΩÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®„ÄÇ

![An image](/images/visualization/logic-flow-4.png)

## ‰∫å„ÄÅÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊìç‰ΩúÊ≠•È™§

### 1ÔºâVUE È°πÁõÆÂºïÂÖ•

```bash
npm install @logicflow/core
npm install @logicflow/extension
```

### 2Ôºâ`.vue`Êñá‰ª∂ÁºñËæë

```vue
<template>
  <div class="container" ref="container"></div>
</template>
<script>
import LogicFlow from '@logicflow/core'
import '@logicflow/core/dist/style/index.css'
export default {
  mounted() {
    this.lf = new LogicFlow({
      container: this.$refs.container,
      grid: true
    })
    this.lf.render({
      nodes: [
        {
          id: '1',
          type: 'rect',
          x: 100,
          y: 100,
          text: { x: 100, y: 100, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ1' }
        },
        {
          id: '2',
          type: 'circle',
          x: 300,
          y: 200,
          text: { x: 300, y: 200, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ2' }
        }
      ],
      edges: [
        {
          sourceNodeId: '1',
          targetNodeId: '2',
          type: 'polyline'
        }
      ]
    })
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.container {
  width: 1000px;
  height: 500px;
}
</style>
```

ÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö

![An image](/images/visualization/logic-flow.png)

### 3ÔºâÂºïÂÖ•Êìç‰ΩúÊéß‰ª∂Á≠â

```vue
<template>
  <div class="container" ref="container"></div>
</template>
<script>
import LogicFlow from '@logicflow/core'
import { Control, Menu, DndPanel } from '@logicflow/extension'
import '@logicflow/core/dist/style/index.css'
import '@logicflow/extension/lib/style/index.css'

LogicFlow.use(Control) // ÊéßÂà∂Èù¢Êùø
LogicFlow.use(Menu) // Âè≥ÈîÆËèúÂçï
LogicFlow.use(DndPanel) // ÊãñÊãΩÈù¢Êùø

export default {
  mounted() {
    let that = this
    this.lf = new LogicFlow({
      container: this.$refs.container,
      grid: true
    })

    // ÊãñÊãΩÈù¢Êùø DndPanel
    this.lf.extension.dndPanel.setPatternItems([
      {
        label: 'ÈÄâÂå∫',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
        callback: () => {
          that.lf.extension.selectionSelect.openSelectionSelect()
          that.lf.once('selection:selected', () => {
            that.lf.extension.selectionSelect.closeSelectionSelect()
          })
        }
      },
      {
        type: 'circle',
        text: 'ÂºÄÂßã',
        label: 'ÂºÄÂßãËäÇÁÇπ',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
      },
      {
        type: 'rect',
        label: 'Áî®Êà∑‰ªªÂä°',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
        className: 'important-node'
      },
      {
        type: 'rect',
        label: 'Á≥ªÁªü‰ªªÂä°',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
        className: 'import_icon'
      },
      {
        type: 'diamond',
        label: 'Êù°‰ª∂Âà§Êñ≠',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
      },
      {
        type: 'circle',
        text: 'ÁªìÊùü',
        label: 'ÁªìÊùüËäÇÁÇπ',
        icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
      }
    ])

    this.lf.render({
      nodes: [
        {
          id: '1',
          type: 'rect',
          x: 100,
          y: 100,
          text: { x: 100, y: 100, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ1' }
        },
        {
          id: '2',
          type: 'circle',
          x: 300,
          y: 200,
          text: { x: 300, y: 200, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ2' }
        }
      ],
      edges: [
        {
          sourceNodeId: '1',
          targetNodeId: '2',
          type: 'polyline'
        }
      ]
    })

    // ÊâìÂç∞ÊµÅÁ®ãÊï∞ÊçÆ
    const xData = this.lf.getGraphData()
    console.log('üöÄ ~ mounted ~ xData:', xData)
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
}
</style>
```

ÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö

![An image](/images/visualization/logic-flow-2.png)

![An image](/images/visualization/logic-flow-3.png)

### 4Ôºâ‰ª£Á†ÅÊï¥ÁêÜ‰ºòÂåñ

> ÊîπÊàê `setup` ËØ≠Ê≥ïÁ≥ñÂΩ¢Âºè

```vue
<template>
  <div class="container" id="container" ref="containerRef"></div>
</template>
<script setup>
import { onMounted, ref, reactive } from 'vue'
import LogicFlow from '@logicflow/core'
import { Control, Menu, DndPanel, MiniMap } from '@logicflow/extension'
import '@logicflow/core/dist/style/index.css'
import '@logicflow/extension/lib/style/index.css'

LogicFlow.use(Control) // ÊéßÂà∂Èù¢Êùø
LogicFlow.use(Menu) // Âè≥ÈîÆËèúÂçï
LogicFlow.use(DndPanel) // ÊãñÊãΩÈù¢Êùø
LogicFlow.use(MiniMap) // ÂØºËà™Â∞èÂú∞Âõæ

const containerRef = ref(null)

const state = reactive({
  lf: {}
})

const init = () => {
  state.lf = new LogicFlow({
    container: containerRef.value,
    // ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑÊñπÂºèÁõ¥Êé•Ëé∑ÂèñÔºàÈÄöËøá getElementById ÊñπÂºèÔºâ
    // container: document.getElementById('container'),
    grid: true
  })

  // ÊãñÊãΩÈù¢Êùø
  state.lf.extension.dndPanel.setPatternItems([
    {
      label: 'ÈÄâÂå∫',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      callback: () => {
        that.lf.extension.selectionSelect.openSelectionSelect()
        that.lf.once('selection:selected', () => {
          that.lf.extension.selectionSelect.closeSelectionSelect()
        })
      }
    },
    {
      type: 'circle',
      text: 'ÂºÄÂßã',
      label: 'ÂºÄÂßãËäÇÁÇπ',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
    },
    {
      type: 'rect',
      label: 'Áî®Êà∑‰ªªÂä°',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      className: 'important-node'
    },
    {
      type: 'rect',
      label: 'Á≥ªÁªü‰ªªÂä°',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      className: 'import_icon'
    },
    {
      type: 'diamond',
      label: 'Êù°‰ª∂Âà§Êñ≠',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
    },
    {
      type: 'circle',
      text: 'ÁªìÊùü',
      label: 'ÁªìÊùüËäÇÁÇπ',
      icon: 'data:image/png;base64,'
    }
  ])

  // Êñ∞Â¢ûcontrol
  state.lf.extension.control.addItem({
    key: 'mini-map',
    iconClass: 'custom-minimap',
    title: '',
    text: 'ÂØºËà™',
    onMouseEnter: (lf, ev) => {
      const position = lf.getPointByClient(ev.x, ev.y)
      lf.extension.miniMap.show(
        position.domOverlayPosition.x - 120,
        position.domOverlayPosition.y + 35
      )
    },
    onClick: (lf, ev) => {
      const position = lf.getPointByClient(ev.x, ev.y)
      lf.extension.miniMap.show(
        position.domOverlayPosition.x - 120,
        position.domOverlayPosition.y + 35
      )
    }
  })

  // Ê∏≤Êüì
  state.lf.render({
    nodes: [
      {
        id: '1',
        type: 'rect',
        x: 300,
        y: 100,
        text: { x: 300, y: 100, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ1' }
      },
      {
        id: '2',
        type: 'circle',
        x: 500,
        y: 200,
        text: { x: 500, y: 200, value: 'ËäÇÁÇπ2' }
      }
    ],
    edges: [
      {
        sourceNodeId: '1',
        targetNodeId: '2',
        type: 'polyline'
      }
    ]
  })
}

onMounted(() => {
  // ÂàùÂßãÂåñÊìç‰Ωú
  init()
})
</script>
<style scoped>
.container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
}
</style>
```

![An image](/images/visualization/logic-flow-4.png)
